title: Star Wars Mandalorian Season 3 Trailer Reaction & Breakdown
description:
Tim and Barrett react to and breakdown the latest trailer for The Mandalorian.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
